org.gearvrf

Class GVRRenderTexture

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gearvrf.GVRHybridObject
      • org.gearvrf.GVRTexture
        • org.gearvrf.GVRRenderTexture
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public class GVRRenderTexture
extends GVRTexture
    Frame Buffer object.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GVRRenderTexture(GVRContext gvrContext, int width, int height)
      Constructs a GVRRenderTexture for a frame buffer of the specified size.
      GVRRenderTexture(GVRContext gvrContext, int width, int height, int sampleCount)
      Constructs a GVRRenderTexture for a frame buffer of the specified size, with MSAA enabled at the specified sample count.

                        int width,

        Constructs a GVRRenderTexture for a frame buffer of the specified size.
        Parameters:
        gvrContext - Current gvrContext
        width - Width of the frame buffer.

      • GVRRenderTexture

        public GVRRenderTexture(GVRContext gvrContext,
                        int width,
                        int height,
                        int sampleCount)
        Constructs a GVRRenderTexture for a frame buffer of the specified size, with MSAA enabled at the specified sample count.
        Parameters:
        gvrContext - Current gvrContext
        width - Width of the frame buffer.
        height - Height of the frame buffer.
        sampleCount - MSAA sample count.
